Many of these festivals follow the lunisolar Hindu calendar, meaning the exact Gregorian date can vary from yr to yr. Some key festivals coming up in 2024 include Holi on 25/03/2024, marking the arrival of spring with colors and joy, and Raksha Bandhan on 19/08/2024, a celebration of the bond between siblings.
